entry.title: [podfic] With Great Power Comes Great Pining
entry.summary:
Author: dairaliz

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: It was the lightning strike. That had to be it. It was the only logical conclusion. Though, when it comes to being able to suddenly read people’s minds, Buck supposed there wasn’t a whole lot of logic involved. Well… Not people. Just... One person’s mind. Just… Eddie’s mind. Podfic of With Great Power Comes Great Pining by Princessfbi.

entry.title: Evan Buckley Off-Shift Adventures
entry.summary:
Author: Spacers24

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,935Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 83

Summary: After over-hearing the 118 saying he should get a life outside of the firehouse, Buck swears that he will make a life for his own outside the firehouse and it's crew. His idea to achieve that is trying out activity he can do during his free time. He never expected that this would lead to him making some new friends. And one things for sure, his new friends and routine is sure to never leave his life boring ever again.

entry.title: The Cut That Almost Bleeds
entry.summary:
Author: Dolly_mae_17

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,167Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 51

Summary: “Evan!” His father shouted. He jumped up so fast, He could see it kinda startled his fam-... team mates. “Hi…” is the only thing he can get out of his mouth. He felt everyone in the station's eyes on him. “What are you guys doing in L.A?” He muttered out. “We needed to talk to you” His mother says, interrupting him. “....okay?” He looked over at Bobby who he saw in real time, eyes getting angry. “Buckley, No disrespect in my station.” Bobby said with a firm, angry, very angry voice.   OR   Post-lawsuit. Everyone is ignoring Buck at the station. his parents come around the station. The firefam finds out some past memories from Buck.

entry.title: The Pumpkin Patch
entry.summary:
Author: inkinmyheartandonthepage

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,239Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 99

Summary: When Bobby Nash announced on their last shift that the 118 would be helping out with the Halloween Festival for the community, Buck had been excited. He loved community events and loved getting involved. Bobby had started handing out their assignments and when he got to Buck – “You’ll be on pumpkin carving.” His heart had sunken in his chest. Buck had kept the smile on his face as everyone got their assignments, but Buck hadn’t been able to keep the small ball of panic that built up inside him. He had never carved a pumpkin in his life. Halloween wasn’t something that his parents had allowed Buck to indulge in when he was growing up.   OR Buck learns to pumpkin carve.

entry.title: Field Trips
entry.summary:
Author: James_Madison_617

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,762Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 18

Summary: Field trips are absolutely Buck’s favorite part about being a firefighter. Every year the two elementary schools down the road send their kindergarten classes for a little walk over to the fire house. They give the kids a tour and answer a bunch of questions, let them try on the turnouts, then take them for a little ride around the block in the engine to finish it off. Easily the highlight of his year every time, occasionally making him regret not going into childcare.  On one of these fieldtrips, he meets the girl he and Eddie adopt. The only problem? She has less than three years to live due to a chronic illness.

entry.summary:
Author: buckstairs

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,408Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 119

Summary: “Hey Eddie! What are you—Oh!” Buck pauses, acts as if he just saw the girl, “Hi there… Uh, you know, he’s gay,” he adds, wincing apologetically.“Buck, what the—”“Taken, too. Come on, babe,” Buck says, grabbing his arm and guiding him away.(Or, Buck knows his best friend is straight, of course, he doesn’t really want to be ditched on their night out, though, which means he needs to bring out the big guns.)

entry.title: My bloody steps leave a trail (I beg you to follow)
entry.summary:
Author: That_humanpersonthing

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,227Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 355

Summary: What if Eddie wasn't ok after Chris left. What if his days started with a practiced smile, and scratches on his thighs so he could feel something other then the numbness. To make him feel something, after being left with nothing when his son walked out the door. What if Eddie saw no hope in getting what he wanted back, he made a plan. Or what if Eddie gives himself two weeks to ensure everything will be ok, and then he'll be gone.

entry.title: Between Heaven and Hell: Buck’s Desire
entry.summary:
Author: caarmeeem

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 64,265Chapters: 49/?Kudos: 171

Summary: When the pact between the Buckleys and Lucifer Morningstar was sealed, Evan’s fate stopped being human. Born to save and be saved, he carries a divine gift that makes him light — but also forces him to face everything that light exposes. As a firefighter at the 118, Buck struggles with the emptiness that haunts him even on his brightest days. Until he meets Eddie Diaz and Christopher, two souls human enough to shatter everything he thought he knew about love, purpose, and belonging. But balance is fragile. Lucifer’s return to Earth unveils the bond between them and forces Buck to choose between the celestial calling that made him and the earthly love that completes him. Between heaven and hell, between the fire that destroys and the one that warms, Buck learns that salvation has a price — and that being light in a world afraid of it may be his greatest curse. A story about faith, family, and the weight of feeling everything — even what hurts. Where hell has a heart, heaven has consequences, and love might be the only form of redemption.

entry.title: fuck it out of you
entry.summary:
Author: kryptonian

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,257Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 222

Summary: “Hey. C’mon. It’s just me, Buck. Talk to me.” Buck reluctantly meets his eye. “You’re gay, Eddie.” Eddie arches a brow. “Yep. I know. We had like a whole talk about it. I did the whole coming out thing. There was a cake.” “There was technically only cupcakes, it was short notice for the team—” Buck’s deflecting. Normally, Eddie loves to listen to Buck ramble, but he decidedly is not interested in letting Buck change the topic right now. Eddie cuts him off with a tap of two fingers to his cheek. “On topic, Buckley. I’m gay. So what?” Buck sighs, leaning forward till their foreheads gently knock. He leans against him, eyes fluttering closed. “You’re gay. And I’m—y’know. Not exactly packing heat.” Oh. That’s what this is about?   OR Buck is insecure about starting to have sex with Eddie. Eddie fucks it out of him.

entry.title: the periodic table and the twisted pigeon
entry.summary:
Author: themisally

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,776Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 14

Summary: Maddie says, “What's this about a meth lab?” “Buck has a crackpot theory,” says Eddie, and he can’t keep the fondness out of his voice. “No, no, okay, listen,” says Buck, grinning at Eddie. “The guy down the street from Eddie is definitely running a meth lab.” “This is the fourth meth lab he’s uncovered this week,” Eddie interjects. “Since he did that toxic substances training.” — In which Buck and Eddie do a little off-the-books detective work, a science project, and a lot of flirting.
